scripts.setup: npm run install-packages-apps && concurrently "npm run webpack-client" "npm run webpack-dapps-lib" "npm run webpack-dapps-download" "npm run webpack-permission-manager" "npm run webpack-main"
scripts.install-packages-apps: concurrently "npm run install-packages-client" "npm run install-packages-main" "npm run install-packages-dapplib" "npm run install-packages-permissions"
scripts.webpack-client: cd electron/client && npm i && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node --max_old_space_size=2096 server.js
scripts.webpack-dapps-lib: cd electron/dapps/lib && npm i && npm run webpack
scripts.webpack-dapps-download: concurrently "npm run webpack-dapps-Chat" "npm run webpack-dapps-Wallet" "npm run webpack-dapps-BlockExplorer" "npm run webpack-dapps-TicTacToe"
scripts.webpack-dapps-Chat: cd electron/dapps/download/Chat && npm i && npm run webpack
scripts.webpack-dapps-Wallet: cd electron/dapps/download/Wallet && npm i && npm run webpack
scripts.webpack-dapps-TicTacToe: cd electron/dapps/download/TicTacToe && npm i && npm run webpack
scripts.webpack-dapps-BlockExplorer: cd electron/dapps/download/BlockExplorer && npm i && npm run webpack
scripts.webpack-main: cd electron/main && npm i && npm run rebuild && npm run webpack
scripts.webpack-permission-manager: cd electron/permissionManager && npm i && npm run webpack
scripts.build-client: cd electron/client && npm i && npm run build
scripts.build-dapp-Chat: cd electron/dapps/download/Chat && npm i && npm run build
scripts.build-dapp-Wallet: cd electron/dapps/download/Wallet && npm i && npm run build
scripts.build-dapp-TicTacToe: cd electron/dapps/download/TicTacToe && npm i && npm run build
scripts.build-dapp-BlockExplorer: cd electron/dapps/download/BlockExplorer && npm i && npm run build
scripts.build-dapp-lib: cd electron/dapps/lib && npm i && npm run build
scripts.build-dapps: npm run build-dapp-Chat && npm run build-dapp-Wallet && npm run build-dapp-TicTacToe && npm run build-dapp-BlockExplorer
scripts.build-main: cd electron/main && npm i && npm run build
scripts.build-permission: cd electron/permissionManager && npm i && npm run build
scripts.build-combine: npm run install-packages-apps && npm run build-client && npm run build-main && npm run build-permission && npm run build-dapp-lib && npm run build-dapps
scripts.build: npm i && npm run clean && npm run build-combine && cd electron/main && npm run dist
